page.title: 20Living in Irthlingborough
page.content:
A collection of the opinions of children who have been taking part in this project: Although I have not lived anywhere else, I like living here. It is lovely being so near the countryside and yet you are not too far from large towns.' I don't like living here because there is nothing to do.' I suppose you really need to have a car because the bus services are not very good and it is expensive to take a family group any distance.' The good thing about living in Irthlingborough is that you would never get lost and most people make you very welcome.'
As you can see, there are as many different opinions as there are people.
